```{r setup, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE, results='asis', warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
options(warn=-1)

library(knitr)
library(yaml)
library(datarepository)
library(tidyverse)

system.file('docs/babs.yaml', package='datarepository') %>%
  read_lines() %>%
  str_replace_all(pattern='\\{.+\\}', replacement='unspecified') %>%
  read_yaml(text=.) %>%
  pluck(1) %>%
  map_at('Path', basename) %>%
  map_at('Scientist', str_remove, pattern='@crick.ac.uk') %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  select(`LIMS ID`=Lims, Scientist, Lab, `Cost code`=Code, `Time estimate`=Estimate, Bioinformatician, `Directory`=Path, Project, `BABS hash`=Hash) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  enframe('', '') %>%
  kable(format='markdown')

cat('\n{{< callout automated >}}\n')
cat('This section was auto-generated.\n')
cat('{{< /callout >}}\n')
```
